meanings.sent1: My nans always bakes delicious cookies for me.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my nans during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: My nans tells the funniest jokes at family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: To me, my nans is like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The image of my nans knitting by the fireplace is etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: The bakery down the street makes the best nans in town.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy having nans with my soup for dinner.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the nans for a pillow in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked nans filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the nans glistened in the sunlight.
